title: Judge Slashes Cuddy Law Firm’s Fees After Questionable Use of AI in Billing
description: In a recent legal ruling, federal district judge Paul Engelmayer has slashed the fees requested by the Cuddy Law Firm, following skepticism over the firm’s use of an AI tool in determining its billing for a special education case.
